Title: SharePoint Total Automation Toolkit
Description: The SharePoint Total Automation Toolkit is a set of data driven tools designed to automate all aspects of SharePoint installation and custom solution deployment
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The SharePoint Total Automation Toolkit is a set of data driven tools designed to automate all aspects of SharePoint installation and custom solution deployment

A detailed description of the project is available at the All Things Microsoft Blog here:
SharePoint Total Automation Toolkit Overview


The help files containing the command syntax and configuration file formats are available here:
SharePoint Total Automation Toolkit Command Reference
(Please keep in mind these are still a work in progress while the project is in Alpha)
